title: Kung Fu Panda
short_plot_summary: A clumsy, overweight panda named Po discovers he's the Dragon Warrior and trains in Kung Fu to save his village from a dangerous enemy.
explanation: A panda, representing the main character, Po
A dumpling, symbolizing Po's love for food and his father's noodle shop
A martial arts uniform, representing Kung Fu and Po's training with Master Shifu
A tiger, symbolizing Master Tigress, one of the Furious Five and a skilled Kung Fu fighter
A snake, representing the villain, Tai Lung, who Po must defeat to save his village
